name: The Paribneur Combination
description:
The Paribneur Combination is a thriller/horror game set in the 90's, where the detective Darren Wolfe is sent to investigate the old building of a company that shut down years ago. You are trapped inside, and must find a new exit.

Explore

Explore the abandoned facilities of Paribneur Co, and collect items that will aid you along the way, as you are forced to find a new way out.

Unveil Secrets

Listen to voice logs and read old papers, and discover the past. Unveil the true intentions of the company. Discover the dark secrets that Paribneur Co. was keeping.

Solve The Combination

Solve The Paribneur Combination, and escape the facility.

Tread Carefully

Otherwordly entities roam the halls...
